text: @RepAdamSchiff I don't believe anyone has ever said the Russian Government is our friend?  We also know that the CCP are most definitely our enemies. Which former VP's son is still doing business with the CCP & the unleashers of a weaponized COVID-19 VIRUS? Maybe this has  all been a big test?
